Subject: Overloaded vehicles on Highways Sir , Government has amended the NH (Fee) Rules, 2008 so that vehicles could not pass through toll plazas unless they offload overloaded the excess load. Further vehicles will be liable to pay fee for entering the overloaded vehicles on the NH equal to ten times of the applicable fee to such A copy of Gazette category of vehicles. notification is enclosed. This is done to ensure life of highways and safety of road user. 2.
